snippet: YouTube lost its prime real estate on the next version of the iPhone, where it has been on the home screen since 2007. In response, YouTube released a new app in the App Store.
abstract: YouTube lost its prime real estate on the next version of the iPhone, where it has been on the home screen since 2007. In response, YouTube released a new app in the App Store.

headline.main: Losing Its Place on the iPhone, YouTube Introduces a New iPhone App
